arts.ttl: Bradford City v Cheltenham Town RECAP: Robins well beaten by Bantams
arts.sum: Cheltenham Town suffered their heaviest defeat of the League Two season so far, going down 3-0 at title-chasing Bradford City on Tuesday night. Bradford City: S Walker; Baldwin, Byrne, Shepherd; Halliday, Smallwood, Adaramola (Huntington 77); J Walker (Oduor 77), Khela; Lapslie (Leigh 68), Mellon (Kavanagh 68).

arts.ttl: Bradford strengthen grip on automatic promotion with win over Cheltenham
Below par, fair result and plan for Bradford City - Cheltenham Town boss Michael Flynn after Grimsby Town draw - Gloucestershire Live
arts.sum: There are things we can improve on, but I've just said to them, we probably deserved at least a point there earlier in the season, getting back into it from 2-0 down, but today I think we'd have lost that if we'd played them back then. I'd say it was a fair result, but Grimsby were the better team in the second half, without Joe (Day) really having a save to make.

arts.ttl: ‘Can see the potential’ – Host delivers verdict on Birmingham City starlet’s Bradford City loan
